itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Gold Ore. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Gold Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Gold Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gold.

item.name: Melted Gold Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Gold Ore.

item.name: Alluvial Gold
item.desc: A rare ingredient filtered from River Water that can be Heated to create Gold.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Thinning a Bottle of River Water.

item.name: Melted Gold Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Gold Ore.

item.name: Trina Cannon Assembly Kit
item.desc:
Able to assemble Trina cannon.
Takes 30 seconds to disassemble.
Any loaded object in the cannon will be deleted after disassembly.
This model has average durability and faster loading speed.
Able to adjust firing angle between 5 different states.
Base Damage: 750
Installed cannons will be deleted after server maintenance.

item.name: Jewelry Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 5 Silver Ingots, 5 Gold Ingots, and 5 Platinum Ingots.

item.name: Golden Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans. The chances of catching good fish are higher than with a regular fishing rod.\n\n- Item Effect: Fishing Speed +3 Levels

item.name: Starry Night Diamond Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Starry Night Diamond.

item.name: Star Diamond Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Star Diamond.

item.name: Translucent Ocean Sapphire Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Translucent Ocean Sapphire.

item.name: Ocean Sapphire Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with an Ocean Sapphire.

item.name: Pure Gold Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Gold Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
